tool_description: Gross Internal Area (GIA) of UK properties
title: UK Property Sizes

api_list.name: propertysize
api_list.description:
GIA (Gross Internal Area) in meters squared 

Takes first line of the property's address and post code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uk-property-sizes.p.rapidapi.com/propertysize/{first_line}/{postcode}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uk-property-sizes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
